title: os.Environ() []string returns environment in random order
body:
Users should expect iteration over a map to be in a random order.

Users probably would not expect a function with this sort of signature & docs to
return random results each time:

    package os
    // Environ returns an array of strings representing the environment,
    // in the form "key=value".
    func Environ() []string {...}

Either the docs or implementation (sorting?) should be fixed.
